discover.instruction: Read about this room. Notice 'there is' and 'there are'.
discover.instruction_ru: Прочитай описание комнаты. Обрати внимание на 'there is' и 'there are'.

content.text: <highlight>There is</highlight> a big window in my room. <highlight>There is</highlight> a bed near the window. <highlight>There are</highlight> two chairs at my desk. <highlight>There is</highlight> a lamp on the desk. <highlight>There are</highlight> many books on the shelf. <highlight>There is</highlight> a cat on my bed. <highlight>There are</highlight> some pictures on the wall. <highlight>There isn't</highlight> a TV in my room. <highlight>There aren't</highlight> any plants.
content.question: When do we use 'there is' and when 'there are'?
content.question_ru: Когда мы используем 'there is', а когда 'there are'?

points.example: There is a book on the table. There is a cat here.
There are two books on the table. There are some cats.
There isn't a TV. There aren't any chairs.
Is there a bathroom? Are there any shops near here?

notice.instruction: Find all 'there is/are' structures and identify singular or plural.
notice.instruction_ru: Найди все структуры 'there is/are' и определи, единственное или множественное число.

tasks.text: My town is nice. There is a big park in the center. There are many trees in the park. There is a lake with ducks. There are some benches to sit on. There isn't a museum, but there is a library. There are three schools in my town. There aren't any tall buildings. Is there a cinema? Yes, there is one near the park.

notice.reflection_question: Why do we use 'There is a park' but 'There are trees'?
notice.reflection_question_ru: Почему 'There is a park', но 'There are trees'?

exercises.instruction: Complete with 'there is', 'there are', 'there isn't', or 'there aren't'.

sentences.incorrect: There are a book on the table.
sentences.correct: There is a book on the table.

sentences.incorrect: There is many cars in the parking lot.
sentences.correct: There are many cars in the parking lot.

prompts: What buildings are in your area? (shops, schools, hospitals)
produce.example: I live in a nice neighborhood. There is a supermarket near my house. There are two schools. There is a small park with trees. There are many apartments. There isn't a cinema, but there is a library. There aren't any factories.
criteria: Uses at least one negative form

input_flood.description: Read 5 texts with many 'there is/are' structures.

texts.title: My Apartment
texts.content: My apartment is small. There is a living room and a bedroom. There is a kitchen too. There are two windows in the living room. There is a balcony. There are some plants on the balcony. There isn't a garden. There are nice neighbors.

texts.title: In the Fridge
texts.content: Let me check the fridge. There is some milk. There are eggs. There is cheese and butter. There are vegetables. There isn't any meat. There aren't any fruits. There is some juice. I need to go shopping.

texts.title: The Classroom
texts.content: Our classroom is big. There are 25 desks. There is a whiteboard on the wall. There are posters too. There is a computer on the teacher's desk. There aren't any windows on one side. There is a door at the back.

texts.title: At the Beach
texts.content: The beach is beautiful. There is white sand. There are many people today. There is a cafe near the beach. There are some boats in the water. There isn't much wind. There are children building sandcastles.

texts.title: My Town
texts.content: My town is small but nice. There is a main street with shops. There are two restaurants. There is a church in the center. There aren't any tall buildings. There is a small hospital. There are buses but there isn't a train station.

grammar_cards.back:
There is a cat in the garden.

Singular = There is

There are many students here.

Plural = There are

is → isn't

Are there shops? / Are there any shops?
